title: Is there borders for the new star gaurdian's loading page?
body: Is there going to be borders for the new star guardian's skins? If there is than how do you get it?

replies.body:
Yes there will be borders. They were on PBE,  here's an album of 'em:

https://imgur.com/a/JZ0Qi
Didn't see anything about special borders for the Star Guardians, but its something we would love to see to be honest! All of the Star Guardians having their own special look to them <3
